name: Gorm Remote Mouse
description: Use Gorm Remote Mouse to control your pc from your android device.   Download the Gorm Desktop App and follow install instructions here https://github.com/lcstudios5563/GormRemoteMouse/blob/master/README.md  The app uses communication over Wifi with the desktop app to enable remote input control  Ensure both app and desktop app are up-to-date  Please consider purchasing upgrade to access extra short cut commands. Server code is open source
